hackathon-description-text: We are students who got snowed in and weren't able to get to PennApps, so we made our own version of it in Pittsburgh

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Constellation will award a $100 amazon gift card to the maker(s) of the best energy-related hack.
Pitt IEEE will award 400 LED's to the hack that makes the best use of diodes.
A year of reddit gold split between your team. Awarded to the outright craziest hack. Details in the Facebook event.

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=3700 O'Hara St, Pittsburgh, PA 15213, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: We judge all projects on arbitrary guidelines made up on the day of the event.

hackathon-description-header: Pitt's snowed in version of PennApps
hackathon-location-description: University of Pittsburgh - Benedum Hall G31
